channel.title: Help Veryfing Images? I am unsure
channel.description: I am on windows 10 and need to properly verify the images. I used Kleopatra and got the verified signature but I read on the website this is a bug and not to be trusted. The sha's all match for the images but however I need further verification can anyone help with this and give simple instructions please? Thanks!

item.title: Help Veryfing Images? I am unsure
item.dc:creator: CBF121
item.description:
It shows gpg4win installing and completely installing yet it doesn’t. When the option to see the read me file comes up it doesn’t let me see it and gpg4win is nowhere on my computer

Read full topic
item.source: Help Veryfing Images? I am unsure

item.title: Help Veryfing Images? I am unsure
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

What do you mean by “goes through the motions”? Could you be more specific?

Have a nice day,

Ego

item.description:

item.title: Help Veryfing Images? I am unsure
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Just use GPG command line like explained here: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Verify_the_virtual_machine_images_using_the_command_line as it works the same on Windows.

Have a nice day,

Ego
